biotools.summary: CAMITAX is a scalable and reproducible workflow for the taxonomic labelling of microbial genomes recovered from isolates, single cells, and metagenomes. CAMITAX combines genome distance–, 16S ribosomal RNA gene–, and gene homology–based taxonomic assignments with phylogenetic placement.
